headline.main: Diller Scofidio + Renfro to Redesign the Pines Pavilion

docs.snippet: A new entertainment complex will replace the Pavilion dance club, a gay landmark in Fire Island Pines that was destroyed in a fire last year....
docs.abstract: A new entertainment complex will replace the Pavilion dance club, a gay landmark in Fire Island Pines that was destroyed in a fire last year.
docs.lead_paragraph: The architects Diller Scofidio + Renfro and the architectural firm HWKN (HollwichKushner) have been hired to design a new entertainment complex to replace the Pavilion dance club, a gay landmark in Fire Island Pines that was destroyed in a fire last year.

headline.main: One Man's Fight With Google Over a Security Warning

docs.snippet: A tussle with Google offers a look at the frustrating nature of Web site infections, which are increasingly ubiquitous but hard to diagnose and cure. Dealing with them can cause even the most sensible people to throw up their hands and seek legal ...
docs.abstract: A tussle with Google offers a look at the frustrating nature of Web site infections, which are increasingly ubiquitous but hard to diagnose and cure. Dealing with them can cause even the most sensible people to throw up their hands and seek legal action.

headline.main: A Documenter of Protests Has a Run-In of His Own

docs.snippet: Some of the people who have helped broadcast the Occupy Wall Street movement were forced to leave a Brooklyn building they were using for their work....
docs.abstract: Some of the people who have helped broadcast the Occupy Wall Street movement were forced to leave a Brooklyn building they were using for their work.
docs.lead_paragraph: When Occupy Wall Street protesters set up their encampment in September in Zuccotti Park, a new category of activist emerged alongside fixtures such as meeting facilitators and medics.
